divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were sitting outside on the back porch of my brother's house and she asked me, "What is that in the sky over there?" and pointed towards the West. I looked and at this point there was an orange glowing sphere in the distance flying straight up from the horizon. At first it made me think that it was a rocket ship taking off in a far distance but there wasn't a trail behind it and we do not live beside any government or privately owned space centers that I know of. My girlfriend is beyond excited, yelling "What is it? What is it?" and I do not respond out of disbelief of my eyes. Moving slowly, it eventually turns into an oblong teardrop shape. We both watched as it ascended into the sky and eventually disappeared.
Summary: Flaming ball of light appeared over treeline slowly ascending and eventually turned into an oblong like shape and disappeared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hernando
There were no other sightings in Hernando on or around August 20th 2013
